subSubSection.paragraph: Philodendron leal-costae Mayo & G.M. Barroso, Aroideana 2: 82. 1979.

Philodendron leal-costae Type. Brazil, Bahia, Serra do Jatoba , Nossa Senhora dos Milagres, Morro do Couro, 06 Mar. 1977, Harley et al. 19428 (holotype: CEPEC; isotypes: K, M, MO, NY, P, RB, SEL, US).
